scripts.compile: rm -rf cache && rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf typechain-types && npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy-polygonMainnet: hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network polygonMainnet && npm run resync-projects-contracts && npm run resync-client-contract-addresses && npm run export-contracts-client
scripts.deploy-polygonMumbai: hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network polygonMumbai && npm run resync-projects-contracts && npm run resync-client-contract-addresses && npm run export-contracts-client
scripts.deploy-binanceMainnet: hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network binanceMainnet && npm run resync-projects-contracts && npm run resync-client-contract-addresses && npm run export-contracts-client
scripts.deploy-ethereumGoerli: hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network ethereumGoerli && npm run resync-projects-contracts && npm run resync-client-contract-addresses && npm run export-contracts-client
scripts.deploy-binanceTestnet: hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network binanceTestnet && npm run resync-projects-contracts && npm run resync-client-contract-addresses && npm run export-contracts-client
scripts.export-contracts-client: cp -rf artifacts ../../../client/src/contracts/public && cp -rf typechain-types ../../../client/src/contracts/public && cp -rf global ../../../client/src/contracts/public
